name: LUKA PLOČE d.d.
description:
Luka Ploče d.d. is one of the primary strategic Croatian ports operating continuously since being founded in 1945. Positioned in the central Adriatic between Split & Dubrovnik, it is located at the intersection of all key logistic routes & was declared the starting/ending point of Corridor Vc in 1997. Its favorable geostrategic position at the crossroad of key industrial routes makes it a crucial link between the Adriatic, Mediterranean & Central Europe. It is listed on the world map of ports, able to accept CAPE SIZE ships (180,000 DWT) & is in the process of inclusion as a Core port on the Trans-European road network.

Business is based on continuous & sustainable growth through ensuring service quality & new investments in technology & growth.

Since 2003, it has been operating as a joint-stock company, registered for maritime transport, port services (loading, unloading, transshipment), warehousing & frieght forwarding.

For more information refer to our webpage: www.luka-ploce.hr
